Stellar Mercury 001 Elite – Green Camo, Flametop Maple Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments Pre- Owned: This guitar has defective clearcoat application, giving the guitar bubbles of air on the entire back of the body. This will probably affect the feel of the neck when you slide your hand around the neck board. It is still a beautiful looking guitar. Don’t blink, you might miss out on this camouflaged guitar! The guitar comes made out of a maple flametop and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. The dark green stain on the mineral pattern of this flame top gives this guitar a camouflage effect while the black painted on the entire back of the body adds to that mean green looking top! The guitar has single ply vintage white binding on the front of the body as well as the neck and headstock. The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D- Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Specs Body: Maple Flametop and mahogany body, singleply binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D- Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark Rosewood, medium Jumbo Frets, pearloid Inlays, single ply binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, single ply binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x Volume Knob, 2x Tone Knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stop Tail Bridge, Diecast tuners, Chrome Hardware MER_ - GC2
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Elite – Green Camo, Flametop Singlecut Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: This guitar has defective clearcoat application, giving the guitar bubbles of air on the entire back of the body.  This will probably affect the feel of the neck when you slide your hand around the neck board.  This is still a beautiful looking guitar and potentially could be stripped and re-clearcoated if you are eager for a project!
